ModMetaData.name: Apparel Recycling Recipe
ModMetaData.author: k2ymg
ModMetaData.description:
This mod add a recipe that allow you to recycle apparels at crafting spot.

Note:
- In fact, this is not recycling; it's smelting. The recycle rate is always 25%.
- You can smelt 'psychic foil helmet' but no return anything.
